value_claims.claim_title: Visual Scout doubles conversion rate for engaged users
value_claims.claim_description: Lowe's ChatGPT-powered assistant 'Mylow' and Visual Scout interactive product discovery tool delivered double the conversion rate among users who engaged with the AI-powered features.
value_claims.source_quote: Already live online and in-app, Mylow has delivered double the conversion rate among users, surfacing not just on-brand product picks but also DIY tutorials and how-to guides.
value_claims.quote_location: S3, section on Lowe's AI Tool
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The conversion rate improvement is directly attributed to the AI-powered assistant Mylow and Visual Scout tool usage

value_claims.claim_title: Visual Scout achieves 180ms 99th percentile response time
value_claims.claim_description: Visual Scout's vector search and feature store implementation delivers low-latency responses with 99th percentile response times of approximately 180 milliseconds, enabling smooth user experience.
value_claims.source_quote: The 99th percentile response times of approximately 180 milliseconds align with our performance expectations, and ensures a smooth and responsive user experience.
value_claims.quote_location: S2, section on Low latency serving with Vertex AI
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Response time is directly measured from the AI-powered Visual Scout system using Vertex AI Vector Search and Feature Store

value_claims.claim_title: Visual Scout enables interactive product discovery experience
value_claims.claim_description: Visual Scout provides an interactive, gamified shopping experience where customers iteratively refine product recommendations through like/dislike feedback, dynamically updating a panel of 10 items in real-time.
value_claims.source_quote: Visual Scout dynamically updates the panel, with items that reflect customer style and design preferences...As the service updates in real time, Visual Scout provides an engaging and gamified shopping experience.
value_claims.quote_location: S2, introduction and How Visual Scout Works sections
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The interactive discovery capability is entirely enabled by AI-powered visual similarity search and real-time recommendation updates

value_claims.claim_title: AI digital companion helps store associates answer customer questions faster
value_claims.claim_description: Lowe's piloted an associate-facing AI digital companion app that helps workers answer complex home improvement questions more efficiently by providing project guidance and product recommendations.
value_claims.source_quote: The app lets associates ask questions about customers' home improvement projects and provides information on both the necessary steps and any products they might need.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The efficiency improvement in answering questions is directly enabled by the AI-powered digital companion providing instant information

value_claims.claim_title: MyLowe's Rewards members spend 50% more than non-members
value_claims.claim_description: Members of MyLowe's Rewards loyalty program spend nearly 50% more than non-members with a notable increase in repeat shopping rates, supporting the expansion to pro contractors.
value_claims.source_quote: Members of MyLowe's Rewards program spend nearly 50% more than non-members with a 'notable increase in repeat shopping rates,' according to SVP and Chief Marketing Officer Jen Wilson.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: While the loyalty program benefits from AI-powered personalization mentioned elsewhere, this metric reflects broader loyalty program impact

value_claims.claim_title: Customer service score increased 6% from 2018 to 2024
value_claims.claim_description: Since CEO Marvin Ellison joined in 2018, Lowe's customer service score increased 6% in Q3 2024 compared to Q3 2018, coinciding with technology and CX investments.
value_claims.source_quote: Since Ellison joined Lowe's in 2018, its customer service score increased 6% in Q3 2024 compared to Q3 2018, according to the investor day presentation.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: AI tools are part of broader CX transformation; improvement reflects multiple initiatives including but not limited to AI implementations

value_claims.claim_title: Professional contractor sales share grew from 19% to 30%
value_claims.claim_description: The share of sales from professional contractors grew from 19% in 2019 to 30% in Q3 2024, supported by CX upgrades and technology investments targeting this segment.
value_claims.source_quote: The share of sales from professional contractors — the target of many CX upgrades — grew from 19% in 2019 to 30% in the latest quarter.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Pro contractor growth is attributed to CX upgrades including AI tools, but represents broader strategic initiatives beyond AI alone

context_claims.claim_title: Lowe's operates in home improvement retail sector
context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's is a major home improvement retailer competing with Home Depot, together accounting for 25% of the combined professional and DIY home improvement market.
context_claims.source_quote: Together, Lowe's and Home Depot account for a quarter of the combined professional and DIY home improvement market, according to Lowe's President and CEO Marvin Ellison.

context_claims.claim_title: Lowe's serves both DIY consumers and professional contractors
context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's customer base includes both DIY (do-it-yourself) consumers and professional contractors, with distinct experiences and loyalty programs for each segment.
context_claims.source_quote: We're confident that there is still a great deal of opportunity for us to grow market share with both pro and DIY customers by building loyalty with our current customers.

context_claims.claim_title: Visual Scout supports ecommerce product discovery
context_claims.claim_description: Visual Scout is deployed on lowes.com and mobile application to enhance online product discovery and browsing experience for customers exploring product catalogs.
context_claims.source_quote: we introduced Visual Scout — an interactive way to explore the product catalog and quickly find products of interest on lowes.com.

context_claims.claim_title: Visual Scout uses computer vision and vector embeddings
context_claims.claim_description: Visual Scout technology is based on computer vision models that generate image embeddings, stored and searched using Vertex AI Vector Search and Feature Store for visual similarity matching.
context_claims.source_quote: Batch processing jobs that compute embeddings for new items by feeding an item's image to a computer vision model as a prediction request; the predicted values are the image's embedding representation.

context_claims.claim_title: Lowe's uses Google Cloud Platform for AI infrastructure
context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's AI solutions are built on Google Cloud services including Vertex AI, Dataproc, BigQuery, and Google Kubernetes Engine for model deployment and serving.
context_claims.source_quote: Visual Scout is supported by several Google Cloud services: Dataproc, Vertex AI Model Registry, Vertex AI Feature Store, Vertex AI Vector Search, BigQuery, Google Kubernetes Engine.

context_claims.claim_title: MyLowe's Pro Rewards relaunch planned for early 2025
context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's announced plans to relaunch its MVP Pro Rewards loyalty program as MyLowe's Pro Rewards in early 2025 during its 2024 analyst and investor day.
context_claims.source_quote: The retailer will relaunch its MVP Pro Rewards loyalty program as MyLowe's Pro Rewards in early 2025, according to an investor day press release.

context_claims.claim_title: Lowe's aims to create friction-free shopping experience
context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's strategic focus is on building loyalty and winning customers through a friction-free shopping experience that combines in-store and online channels using AI solutions.
context_claims.source_quote: winning new customers looking for a friction-free shopping experience within home improvement...Lowe's intends to combine the in-store and online experiences through the use of AI solutions.

context_claims.claim_title: AI assistant supports in-store associate customer service
context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's is piloting an associate-facing AI digital companion to help store workers answer complex home improvement questions and recommend products to customers.
context_claims.source_quote: The company is piloting an associate-facing digital companion that can help workers answer customer questions faster and more efficiently.

context_claims.claim_title: Visual Scout performs billion-scale vector search
context_claims.claim_description: Vertex AI Vector Search provides efficient vector similarity search and retrieval from a billion-scale vector database to support Visual Scout's product recommendations.
context_claims.source_quote: Vertex AI Vector Search is a managed service providing efficient vector similarity search and retrieval from a billion-scale vector database.

context_claims.claim_title: Marvin Ellison joined Lowe's as CEO in 2018
context_claims.claim_description: Current Lowe's President and CEO Marvin Ellison joined the company in 2018, initiating a period of technology and customer experience transformation.
context_claims.source_quote: Since Ellison joined Lowe's in 2018, its customer service score increased 6% in Q3 2024 compared to Q3 2018.

context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's deployed 'Mylow', a ChatGPT-powered AI assistant available online and in-app that provides product recommendations, DIY tutorials, and how-to guides.
context_claims.source_quote: Lowe's ChatGPT-powered assistant, 'Mylow.' Already live online and in-app, Mylow has delivered double the conversion rate among users, surfacing not just on-brand product picks but also DIY tutorials.

context_claims.claim_title: Future plans include image-based product search
context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's plans to expand AI capabilities in 2026 to allow shoppers to snap photos of products and receive recommendations, extending visual search beyond current text-based interactions.
context_claims.source_quote: In 2026, shoppers may be snapping pics of their outdated fixtures and getting instant product matches and installation advice.

context_claims.claim_description: Lowe's launched a third-party marketplace and plans to enable store associates to search for and sell items from this marketplace using AI-powered tools.
context_claims.source_quote: letting store associates search for and sell items from Lowe's third-party marketplace, which launched Wednesday.
